Name: <color=#7FFF00>Custom Dialogue Box</color>

Text: <color=#7FFF00>Custom Dialogue Box 2</color>

Name: Custom Dialogue Box
Text: Custom Dialogue Box 3 (3s)

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>According to the map, we've landed at the designated location—</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>The data analysis cabin on space station.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>But... our aircraft has been destroyed...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>If we can destroy the space station's defense system, we're able to retreat when the main forces arrive.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>These terminals seem bizarre...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Those are what the report said—the corruption occurred on this space station only.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>You must be careful, Lee.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>...What's this?</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>More authorities unlocked...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Wait, that cross is guarding the gate...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>According to my preliminary scan result, this type of enemy doesn't have a typical mechanical structure inside its body...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>It is... composed entirely of Punishing Virus...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>This space station must be hiding some important secrets...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>It seems we can do more than just destroying it.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Guys, I've turned off the space station's remote sensing system.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Well done, Liv.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>It should be able to reduce its attacks against Babylonia.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Yep, this is the first step for us.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>We arrived at the second target location—</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>According to the analysis, here is the weapon control system backend...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>After the space station being corrupted.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>There remain many inactivated Heteromers...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>If they become enemies just like...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Have you noticed that cross-shaped enemy in the middle?</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Although we're not at all clear about the mechanism...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>this type of enemy seems to control the spawning of other enemies, and—</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>The key to dealing with our problems, I understood...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Those black pillars... decompose... reconstruct...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Every bit of the Hetero-matter of Punishing Virus in this space station could become our enemy...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Our attacks can make them remain inactive—</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>At least we found a way, right?</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Yep, let's continue in this way.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Finally—</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Ah... Some Hetero-matter have regenerated energy and started to act again!</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Tch, at this rate, we'll be drained sooner or later...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Liv, access the control system directly. Lee—</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Got it.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>It's done!</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>All close-range firepower for interception purposes has been turned off!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Well done, Liv.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>The subsequent troops have begun to issue a new assembly signal.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>We don't have to fight purely on our own at last.</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>However, you seem to have much trouble here.</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>Let's skip chit-chatting—</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>And see this as my gift for you.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Those enemies have shown a new attack mode.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>But Watanabe has already been able to cope with them...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>You're so strong...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>It feels completely different from the time we met him before.</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>So, is everything fine?</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Should I say thanks to you?</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>Hmph, still quite energetic.</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>...From here on, it'll be a bit different.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>The gate is locked by encryption, which means it's Lee's turn.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>(Analyzing...)</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Very well...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>There's four corrupted terminals right in the four corners of this compartment.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Varied combinations can be produced by switching their respective forms...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Let's try different combinations.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>The encryption has been cracked, but it causes those Heteromers to enter defense mode...</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>Anyway, we made certain progress.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Let's finish the remaining enemies.</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>Lucia... Why is she so enthusiastic...</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>I see. It's a challenge, isn't it? Hmph...</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>All right, I accept it—Let's see who can sweep the enemies away faster.</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>How's it? I haven't disappointed you, have I?</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>...Impressive.</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>Let's work together to protect Liv from the last wave of attacks.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>...Yeah.</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>Maybe my life is for this moment...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>What did you say, Watanabe?</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>... Nothing.</size>

Name: Korolev
Text: <size=33>You... haven't complied with... the regulations...</size>

Name: Korolev
Text: <size=33>Now... Kids... come to the confinement cabin with Korolev...</size>

Name: Korolev
Text: <size=33>Accept your punishment...</size>

Name: Korolev
Text: <size=33>If any resistance occurs... Korolev will follow the rules... to adopt the minimum enforcement measures...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Liv, this... is...?</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>It's not composed of Hetero-matter. It's a real Corrupted... I'm afraid...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>It is the annoying broadcast we've been listening to all the time?</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>But, in such high viral density environment... Can a machine truly maintain its original consciousness?</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>It strikes me that... it's been held in captivity alone... What could be the reason for that...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>We might have no answers to it... All I know now is that we only have one choice...</size>

Name: Korolev
Text: <size=33>Confinement...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>The surrounding gravity becomes abnormal...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>The core of space station... Gravity room. We finally made it.</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>It's the gravity experiment here that produces Hetero-matter—</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>Who would have thought humans would not only suffer from Punishing Virus but also help it create a new form...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Watanabe... Thank you for fighting with us all this way...</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>Don't worry, I won't leave until the threat of this space station is resolved.</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>I know those enemies were just warm-up for you.</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>Let's show our true power to them now.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>These crosses... appear again...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>It's like their presence is conveying a certain "message"...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Commandant, we can't go any further...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>This is an artificially designed area. Now that we've dispatched the enemies—</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>The mechanism should be able to resume normal operation.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Try to get close to the edge.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>What a stunning design...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>It is achieved only by precise gravity manipulation...</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>I remember there's gravity generators inside Babylonia as well.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Yes... But I never thought I would be so close to its prototype...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>I've tried it out. It's fine to go—</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Keep on going!</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>What's this...?</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Some kind of mechanism again... Should take a look at it.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>It's a device used to lock those rings.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>In such a way, it can stabilize the rings and gravity core.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Those rings are nearly the same. Let's continue in this way.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>...Yeah.</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>I'm not sure what would happen if you operated it incorrectly...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>But please follow my instructions.</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>The first message is—</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>"Two into one."</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>Do you have any idea about it?</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>It seems to be related to these light beams...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>I'll try to crack it forcibly, but it's going to take some time.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>It might trigger a higher level of defense system. Anyway, let's get through this together, Commandant.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>It worked.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Miss Ayla, please provide the next instruction!</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>Okay, the next message is—</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>"From abstract to concrete."</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Abstract and concrete... We've encountered enemies that gave us similar feelings.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Which means... "Starting from the abstract"?</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Let's do it then!</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>We can move on now!</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>The path is blocked off again.</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>As you can see... There's three movable mechanisms...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Yes!</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>According to the record, the tip here is—</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>"The beginning is the end."</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Hmm, I think I've figured it out...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Same as before, I'll try to crack it forcibly.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>As expected, you solved the puzzle first, Commandant.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Ah, here we're again...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>It should be the last mechanism for this ring.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Please tell us the last tip.</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>Okay, listen carefully—</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>"Divide is complete."</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>It's getting hard to understand...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>But experience told us we have to create a certain pattern using these light beams.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Although I'm not quite certain about it, I think we should create as much "divide" as possible.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Backend hacking is also in progress.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>So, it's... correct?</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Yep, well done!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>...</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>The mechanism that controls the rings appeared.</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>Let's resume.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Only a few rings left.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Hm, we'd better hurry. Other troops should be on their way now.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>No matter what enemies are waiting for us at the end,</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>This time, we have many teammates on our side.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>The enemies this time seem different...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>They haven't decomposed upon being defeated. Instead—</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>They entered a state similar to hibernation... Energy flowed steadily inside their body...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>No more path occurs ahead. Perhaps it is because of this kind of enemy.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Commandant, I don't know what you're thinking of it, but we'd better act with caution.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>After all, this enemy has appeared with certain modifications.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Wait... Are they... coming to us?</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>But they haven't shown any intention to assault...</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>It's impossible for Punishing Virus not to show any aggressiveness.</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>Unless...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>What's concerning you, Watanabe?</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>I'll speak for him—Unless it's their "choice."</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Punishing Virus' choice? You mean Punishing Virus is able to make a choice?</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>It's a feature of possessing consciousness. But...</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>I don't know... I'm afraid no one can explain this situation clearly.</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>We can only go forward now.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>The path occurs. The energy inside these enemies has been transferred to the mechanism...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>And flowed into its central core.</size>

Name: Watanabe
Text: <size=33>It sounds terribly bad...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>That core is the primary target in this assault ordered by Babylonia.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>At least... We're getting closer to our ultimate target.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>No more new enemies, Lucia.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Then, this is the last mechanism.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>After passing through this, we'll face the largest Heteromer parasitic on the gravity core.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Any hesitation is unnecessary at this point.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>...Gray Raven, prepare for battle!</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 9 Fallen Star Hidden 9-1
Ayla
Text: <size=33>I haven't met Selena yet...!</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>I can hear her voice!</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>It's clear, and close...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>We're finally going to meet again, Selena...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>Just hang on for one more moment...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>Keep singing...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>What was that...?</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>!</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>That tremor...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>The space station is... breaking up?</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>It can't keep going like this. Not only Selena, but other troops will also...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>I have to come up with a solution...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>I should be able to access the control system by that.</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>It seems pretty old-style...</size>

Name: System
Text: <size=33>Electromagnetic lock control module back online, insufficient authority to modify...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>Although I can't modify it directly, it should be good enough for now.</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>Okay, next...</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 9 Fallen Star Hidden 9-2
Ayla
Text: <size=33>Selena should be nearby...</size>

Name: Korolev
Text: <size=33>Intruders detected... Intruders detected...</size>

Name: Korolev
Text: <size=33>You must buy a sightseeing ticket first... Please buy your ticket at the ticket booth...</size>

Name: Korolev
Text: <size=33>Otherwise, a special procedure will be initiated...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>What's this...?</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>That's pretty...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>Do you know where Selena is?</size>

Name: Korolev
Text: <size=33>Initiating enforcement procedure—</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>Seems I don't have a choice...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>I have no time for this. Bring it on!</size>

Name: Korolev
Text: <size=33>Higher threat level detected—</size>

Name: Korolev
Text: <size=33>Abandoned current mission—</size>

Name: Korolev
Text: <size=33>Go to the location—gravity room.</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>Ah... Ran off...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>But I can search around at last...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>(Searches and digs around)</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>There's some logbooks stored in the terminal. They should be useful...</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 9 Fallen Star Hidden 9-3
Ayla
Text: <size=33>Hostile signals?</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>Alright, Selena, just wait a little longer. I'll be right back.</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>The interference is too strong...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>After wiping out the enemies here, I have to find another terminal as a signal amplifier—</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>In doing so, I can contact Gray Ravens...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>According to the topographic map, there should be a terminal ahead.</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>Found it!</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>But... that is not good.</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>Those Heteromers are protecting the terminal. And there's a robot guard near it...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>I'd better not get close to those cubes...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>And that robot guard... seems to communicate with the terminal in certain ways...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>In short, I have to activate it!</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>Activated the robot guard!</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>Yeah, it works!</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>It seems the Heteromers here could be easily deconstructed...</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>Maybe they've lost too much energy because of Gray Raven.</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>Let me see if the terminal still works.</size>

Name: Ayla
Text: <size=33>It is activated. Finally I can contact Gray Ravens.</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 10 Eternal Engine Normal 10-2
Liv
Text: <size=33>High concentration of Punishing Virus detected! It's...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>A hideous appearance indeed.</size>

Name: Celica
Text: <size=33>Can you hear me, Gray Ravens? I've detected that you've successfully landed on the train.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>...And we are now facing the target.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Lee, you mean...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>The Hetero-Core has been highly corrupted and mutated when falling to Earth. The target we've been after is right before us.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Permission for engagement, Commandant.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>The Heterozygote's claws seem super dangerous.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Perhaps we can entice it to attack us, then we have a chance to destroy its claws.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>It's not working. Our attacks hardly deal any damage to it.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Watch out, it isn't finished yet.</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 10 Eternal Engine Normal 10-3
Liv
Text: <size=33>This train is...?</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Focus. The enemies aren't finished yet.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Punishing concentration continues to surge... It's corrupting the new train!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Liv, bring sufficient serum. We'll go after it.</size>

Name: Changyu
Text: <size=33>Hey, you're not here to make the deal, are you?</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>What are you talking about?</size>

Name: Changyu
Text: <size=33>If it stops here, Lord Jamilah's plan will be disrupted. It's time to act, Sophia!</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>...Understood. Then push it to the front.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Who are these...?</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>The sandstorm has disrupted our visual system and the number of Corrupted is increasing. They will hinder our pursuit.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Commandant, I propose that we adjust the operation, passing through inside the train to intercept our target.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Glass cupola...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Perhaps we can go inside the train through the cupola.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>At this rate, the train will enter the area ravaged by sandstorm... We'll be forced to abandon the pursuit.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>But if we don't deal with it right now, this train will be the next victim...</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 10 Eternal Engine Normal 10-4
Liv
Text: <size=33>Those mechanoids are... attacking each other?</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>The signals show that they are the machines used for train maintenance.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>...It seems that the uncorrupted mechanoids are defending against the corrupted ones.</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>Let me help you.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>You're here too, Sophia.</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>In order to evacuate the people, we have to intercept the Heterozygote formed by core mutation.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>This way!</size>

Name: Commoner
Text: <size=33>That is the aristocrats' carriage. If we enter without permission...</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>Commoners and aristocrats, aren't we humans at the end of the day? Come this way if you want to live!</size>

Name: Commoner
Text: <size=33>...</size>

Name: Commoner
Text: <size=33>Okay, got it.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>We're safe now.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Great...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>We'd better leave once we've planned our next step.</size>

Name: System
Text: <size=33>(Akdilek Record)</size>

Name: System
Text: <size=33>This train will be refitted with the Central Purification Filter in City 020, 030, and 050.</size>

Name: System
Text: <size=33>But the truth is, the filter is not capable of supporting the whole train.</size>

Name: System
Text: <size=33>Therefore, after the completion of all works, all carriages will be classified and, superior races will be separated from the inferior ones.</size>

Name: System
Text: <size=33>Like Babylonia, we will keep hope alive.</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 10 Eternal Engine Normal 10-5
Lucia
Text: <size=33>Sophia, enemy signals come from there!</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>There's a ladder ahead on the train roof.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>If we'd been allowed to do our work earlier, none of this would've happened.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Message from the command center... Reinforcements?</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Move now, Commandant.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Wait, something falling down!</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>No more obstacles. I have to reach Changyu quickly.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Let's go, Commandant!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Is it... a letter?</size>

Name: Construct
Text: <size=33>My name... It no longer matters. I thought I could have gotten through this train and completed the mission.</size>

Name: Construct
Text: <size=33>But in the end, I was still a fool. I was classified as a pariah, a slave.</size>

Name: Construct
Text: <size=33>If we don't act... The Ascendants will...</size>

Name: Construct
Text: <size=33>I'm already drained... So...!</size>

Name: Construct
Text: <size=33>Please be careful of... a thing called "Lullaby".</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 10 Eternal Engine Normal 10-6
Lee
Text: <size=33>The kid from Akdilek... seems to be severely wounded.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Ready to fight!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>We're able to close in on the enemies at this rate.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Wait, Lucia, Lee. The Heterozygote's reaction...</size>

Name: Rail Heterozygote
Text: <size=33>—</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Uh!!!</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Lucia! Lee!</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Commandant, Lucia and Lee have fallen off the train!</size>

Name: Rail Heterozygote
Text: <size=33>—!!!</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>If we get off the train now, those people might...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>The radar doesn't lose Lucia and Lee's signals...</size>

Name: Rail Heterozygote
Text: <size=33>—!!!</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>At this rate... Let's go back to the carriage first and wait for Lucia and Lee, Commandant.</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 10 Eternal Engine Normal 10-7
Corrupted
Text: <size=33>Urgh!!!</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>My presence has been exposed...</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>It's been a long time since I used this frame.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>Hope I can still handle it.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>The gate operating system has been damaged a bit.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>We can find the parts from the nearby remains to repair it...</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>Only uncorrupted parts can be used to fix the gate.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>There are many Corrupted nearby. Any mistakes will alert them. Be careful.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>...Still works.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>Everything seems to have remained the same.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>Then, I only have to wait on the second floor.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>Finally, the upper floor... Should be able to see the train soon.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>We need to move fast.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>It's Gronin Station notice...</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>...This station will cease operations once the construction of Gestalt's new circuit network is completed.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>All gates will be closed from today onward, and the staff will be transported out of this place once their IDs are deleted.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>But those track maintenance machines, whether they are personal property or not, are not allowed to be taken away from this station.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>Afterward, (an unclear name) will take over the station.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>This is the Gestalt Order No. 202 approved by the World Government. Please keep calm and follow the order.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>The train will pass through here soon enough.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>But the gate has blocked the passage. We have to close it again as soon as possible.</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 10 Eternal Engine Normal 10-8
Bianca
Text: <size=33>There are many Corrupted lurking around.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>We can't go forward if we don't deal with this.</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 10 Eternal Engine Normal 10-9
Bianca
Text: <size=33>All cleared. And the next is...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Bianca... Why are you here?</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>Lucia? and that motorcycle...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>I found it ahead. I'm ready to go after it now.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>...</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>What's wrong?</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>You're not going?</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>(Sighs)</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 10 Eternal Engine Normal 10-10
Lucia
Text: <size=33>Full speed ahead!</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>Wait, slow down!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>The train runs too fast, but I can't lag behind anymore. Commandant needs me.</size>

Name: Rail Heterozygote
Text: <size=33>—</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Bianca, please shoot down the enemies in our way, otherwise we won't be able to approach the train.</size>

Name: Bianca
Text: <size=33>Target confirmed in the Hawkeye sight distance.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>That's good enough, Bianca. Let's jump on the train!</size>

Name: Rail Heterozygote
Text: <size=33>—!</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>It's still moving forward. The train will stop running if the engine is corrupted, and the people will...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>The filter will go down if the train stops...</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Which means arriving at the terminal earlier than expected?</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>This isn't the train's terminal... Our train won't stop there!</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>This is—Watch out!</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>It's just like in the space station. A faint energy activity still remains within that burnt frame!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Same move again? But this time...</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 10 Eternal Engine Normal 10-1
Liv
Text: <size=33>High concentration of Punishing Virus detected! The Corrupted are swarming in—</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>I'm here to help. Please continue the rescue and evacuation.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>I'll do my best!</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>I'll handle the Corrupted on the other side with Lee.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Got it!</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>All people have been evacuated, and some of the wounded have received emergency treatment.</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>Thank you...</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 10 Eternal Engine Normal 10-2
Liv
Text: <size=33>Be careful. Those two Corrupted's energy reactions are abnormal.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Stay alert. They might be hiding nearby.</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>I'll take care of them. You take the opportunity to break through the passage.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Okay, then we'll destroy the Corrupted lurking there.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Please be careful, Sophia.</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>Got it...</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>Battle over.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>The passage is clear!</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>It's clear, Sophia!</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>Understood. I'm coming now.</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 10 Eternal Engine Normal 10-3
Liv
Text: <size=33>Please be careful, Sophia!</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>The signals show that they are the machines used for train maintenance.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Watch out for their special attacks.</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>It's all cleared.</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>Let's meet up with them now. Changyu's there too.</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 10 Eternal Engine Normal 10-4
Lucia
Text: <size=33>It's shell is hard to break. Liv, can you identify its weaknesses?</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>I'm trying!</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>We can't go on like this.</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>Gray Raven is fighting the Core's Heteromers.</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>Fend off the Corrupted. Ensure they won't bring any trouble to us.</size>

Name: Changyu
Text: <size=33>...I'll take care of the ones behind us.</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>If you push yourself too far, I'll stop you no matter what.</size>

Name: Changyu
Text: <size=33>Don't sweat it. I have a plan.</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>All cleared. Changyu, what's the situation on your end?</size>

Name: Changyu
Text: <size=33>...</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>Changyu?</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 10 Eternal Engine Normal 10-5
Changyu
Text: <size=33>Sorry... I've dragged you down...</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>Then save your breath. I have to deal with your wounds first.</size>

Name: Changyu
Text: <size=33>...Roger that.</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>This way leads back to the carriage.</size>

Name: Rail Heterozygote
Text: <size=33>—</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>I'll be back right away.</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 10 Eternal Engine Normal 10-6
Liv
Text: <size=33>I'll help you collect the parts.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>Please be careful, Sophia...</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>I'll be careful...</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>That's enough.</size>

Name: Sophia
Text: <size=33>Half of the Corrupted have been destroyed. This area is safe for now.</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 11 Nona Ouroboros Normal 11-2
Commandant
Text: <size=33>A connection is made to a virtual M.I.N.D. of one of the guards outside.</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=33>The virtual M.I.N.D. of mechanoid is more akin to a simulation of reality.</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=33>Perhaps the key to the cabin door can be found in its memory data.</size>

Name: Ballwheel IV
Text: <size=33>Thinking circuits... Abnormal...</size>

Name: M.I.N.D. Data 004
Text: <size=33>Area under attack... Intruders are... From... Side E...</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=33>Lucia, Liv, Lee. Wait for me.</size>

Name: M.I.N.D. Data 001
Text: <size=33>Type IV... Rolling out. Type I, disobeyed orders, dismantled.</size>

Name: M.I.N.D. Data 002
Text: <size=33>Cutting, isn't, performing. Want, voice, device. Want, singing.</size>

Name: M.I.N.D. Data 003
Text: <size=33>Protect, the, goods. Why, not, a, performance mission?</size>

Name: Mysterious Voice
Text: <size=33>The traps have an attack interval. Maybe you can find an opportunity to go through.</size>

Name: Mysterious Voice
Text: <size=33>The virtual M.I.N.D. is still part of the M.I.N.D., so there may be some overflowing data.</size>

Name: Mysterious Voice
Text: <size=33>Once attacked, you'll need some time to regenerate.</size>

Name: Mysterious Voice
Text: <size=33>If you find a trap impossible to pass, try destroying it with attacks.</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 11 Nona Ouroboros Normal 11-4
Lee
Text: <size=33>So this place isn't unguarded after all. Look at those performer-bots...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>They're coming for us.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Seems like they don't want to disturb the people in the night market.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>They may have been ordered to ensure the market is running normally.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>They want to direct us away from the market. Great, exactly what we want.</size>

Name: Liv
Text: <size=33>No infection detected. They're just normal mechanoids...</size>

Name: Commandant
Text: <size=33>Don't damage their core modules. Do it cleanly, then we get off the ship.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>...Yeah.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Commandant, please give your orders.</size>

Name: All
Text: <size=33>(Cheering)</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>The people thought we were putting on a show...</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Now that Commandant is back, let's get off the ship first.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>...They found us already. How fast.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Let's go.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Now they're waiting ahead of us?</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>We don't have time. We'll have to force through them...</size>
<size=33>At least let me finish!</size>
<size=33>Stop them.</size>

Name: Main Story Chapter 11 Nona Ouroboros Normal 11-5
Lee
Text: <size=33>I already scanned their model. Their memory data is most likely stored externally in the chips on their back.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Can you copy their memory data without destroying their memory shell?</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>It's doable. But I'll need Commandant's "connection device."</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>Connection device?</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>It should be an amplifier. Or at least one of its functions is to amplify signals.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>...The low-level design of the device is identical to the ship's system. Might have slight differences, but I can't tell yet.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>I just need to make a few changes to monitor and adjust the ship's environment.</size>

Name: Lee
Text: <size=33>Liv, you try hacking into their cores in the meantime. I'll adjust the environment to help you.</size>

Name: Lucia
Text: <size=33>I'll retrieve the chips.</size>
